question: Niyyat in Worldly Education
answer:
QUESTION
I am a Electrical Engineering Student in USA and Alhamdullillah trying to get complete deen in my life by asking everything from Ulama and spending time in Mosque.But most of my time passed in my student. I want that my neeat should be such that it also becomes my deen and I should get ajar of this aakhira.What should be my Neeat?
ANSWER


Share:
Your Niyyat (intention) to study should be to support yourself and dependants in future as that is the order of Allah.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
